mapper.select: select id, name, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate from guestbook order by reg_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where id = #{id} and password = #{password}

choose.when: insert into board values (null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no), 0) + 1 from board a ), 1, 0, #{userNo})

select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like '%${keyword}%' or contents like '%${keyword}%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}
select count(*) from board where (title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%')
